# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="cc82d-102">Lägga till flaggor och påminnelser i Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cc82d-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cc82d-103">Ange eller redigera en påminnelse för en händelse:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cc82d-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="cc82d-104">Gå till [kalendern](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cc82d-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="cc82d-105">Välj den händelse du vill bli påmind om och sedan på pilarna i det övre högra hörnet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cc82d-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="cc82d-106">att expandera den.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cc82d-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="cc82d-107">Vid **Påminn mig**, väljer du en påminnelse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cc82d-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="cc82d-108">Dina ändringar sparas automatiskt i Outlook.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cc82d-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cc82d-109">Om du vill påminna dig själv om du vill följa upp ett meddelande, kan du lägga till en uppföljningsflagga:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cc82d-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="cc82d-110">Gå till [e-post](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cc82d-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="cc82d-111">Hovra över att se flaggalternativet meddelandet i meddelandelistan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cc82d-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="cc82d-112">Välj flaggikonen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cc82d-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="cc82d-113">att flagga meddelandet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cc82d-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cc82d-114">Välj markering i det nedre vänstra hörnet på sidan för att gå till aktiviteter om du vill se alla flaggade meddelanden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cc82d-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="cc82d-115">Om du vill veta mer läser du [flagga eller PIN-kod för ett meddelande i Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cc82d-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
